org.openmuc.jdlms.util
Class ConformanceHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.openmuc.jdlms.util.ConformanceHelper

public class ConformanceHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class to get meaningful values out of a BerBitString bit string

Method Detail

isReadAllowed

public static boolean isReadAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if SN read operation is allowed on this connection. If SN read is not allowed, the wrong referencing method has been set on connection creation

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if operation is allowed

isWriteAllowed

public static boolean isWriteAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if SN write operation is allowed on this connection. If SN write is not allowed, the wrong referencing method has been set on connection creation

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if operation is allowed

isUnconfirmedWriteAllowed

public static boolean isUnconfirmedWriteAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if an unconfirmed SN write operation is allowed on this connection. If unconfirmed SN write is not allowed, the wrong confirmedMode has been set on connection creation

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if operation is allowed

isAttribute0SetAllowed

public static boolean isAttribute0SetAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if a single LN set operation may change all public attributes of a single interface class object in one go by accessing the attribute with id 0.

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if operation is allowed

isPrioritySupported

public static boolean isPrioritySupported(BerBitString c)
Checks if the remote smart meter supports higher priority operations. Normally, operations will be computed in order of receipt. If supported, an operation with high priority can bypass this queue and be computed before any normal priority operations are processed.

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if feature is supported

isAttribute0GetAllowed

public static boolean isAttribute0GetAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if a single LN get operation may read all public attributed of a single interface class object in one go by accessing the attribute with id 0.

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if operation is allowed

isGetBlockTransferAllowed

public static boolean isGetBlockTransferAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if a LN get operation, that exceeds the remote APDU size; can be transmitted in multiple parts (so called data blocks). This feature only allows transmission of data blocks from smart meter to the client (results). There is no way to send a get request as a data block.

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if feature is supported

isSetBlockTransferAllowed

public static boolean isSetBlockTransferAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if a LN set operation, that exceeds the remote APDU size, can be transmitted in multiple parts (so called data blocks). This feature allows transmit of set data blocks in both directions (request and result)

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if feature is supported

isActionBlockTransferAllowed

public static boolean isActionBlockTransferAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if a LN action operation, that exceeds the remote APDU size, can be transmitted in multiple parts (so called data blocks). This feature allows transmit of action data blocks in both directions (request and result)

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if feature is supported

isMultipleReferenceAllowed

public static boolean isMultipleReferenceAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if a single operation (SN/LN) is allowed to reference multiple variables at once.

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if feature is supported

isInformationReportAllowed

public static boolean isInformationReportAllowed(BerBitString c)
Check if SN information report (SN version of EventNotification) from the remote smart meter is allowed. If this feature is turned of, the smart meter shall send no events to the client at any time

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if feature is supported

isParameterizedAccessAllowed

public static boolean isParameterizedAccessAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if a SN read/write/unconfirmedWrite operation is allowed to select only a part of the referenced attribute. This feature is useful if only a subset of a complex attribute type is needed in this particular operation

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if feature is supported

isGetAllowed

public static boolean isGetAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if LN get operation is allowed on this connection. If LN get is not allowed, the wrong referencing method has been set on connection creation

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if operation is allowed

Returns:
true if operation is allowed

isSelectiveAccessAllowed

public static boolean isSelectiveAccessAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if a LN get/set operation is allowed to select only a part of the referenced attribute. This feature is useful if only a subset of a complex attribute type is needed in this particular operation

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if feature is supported

isEventNotificationAllowed

public static boolean isEventNotificationAllowed(BerBitString c)
Checks if LN event notification from the remote smart meter is allowed. If this feature is turned of, the smart meter shall send no events to the client at any time

Parameters:
c - BerBitString to check
Returns:
true if feature is supported
